descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ffff00][size=4]What this mod does is fix the Dremora Lord to be that of an TRUE Dremora Lord, because the original had the same stats as the Dremora Valynaz, but -200 health, so 545 - 200 = 345...

This mod removes the -200, brings him back to 545 health, but I also made him 2 levels higher, from 46 to 48, and it has precalculated his stats to be slightly higher than the Valynaz as it should be, because he is an Dremora "LORD"!

This mod isn't over kill, it is fare, lore-friendly, and makes sense, and this is how it should of been from the release of the game.[/size][/color]

[size=3][Melee Fighters Only Chart]
[/size]
[size=3]Dremora Churl - Lvl 6[/size]
[size=3]Health: 105[/size]
[size=3]Magicka: 50[/size]
[size=3]Stamina: 70[/size]
[size=3]-[/size]
[size=3]Dremora Caitiff - Lvl 12[/size]
[size=3]Health: 171[/size]
[size=3]Magicka: 50[/size]
[size=3]Stamina: 94[/size]
[size=3]-[/size]
[size=3]Dremora Kynval - Lvl 19[/size]
[size=3]Health: 248[/size]
[size=3]Magicka: 50[/size]
[size=3]Stamina: 122[/size]
[size=3]-[/size]
[size=3]Dremora Kynreeve - Lvl 27[/size]
[size=3]Health: 336[/size]
[size=3]Magicka: 50[/size]
[size=3]Stamina: 154[/size]
[size=3]-[/size]
[size=3]Dremora Markynaz - Lvl 36[/size]
[size=3]Health: 435[/size]
[size=3]Magicka: 50[/size]
[size=3]Stamina: 190[/size]
[size=3]-[/size]
[size=3]Dremora Valynaz - Lvl 46[/size]
[size=3]Health: 545[/size]
[size=3]Magicka: 50[/size]
[size=3]Stamina: 230[/size]
[size=3]-----------------------------[/size]
[size=3]Dremora Lord - Lvl 46[/size]
[size=3]Health: 345 (original because of the -200 Bethasda placed)[/size]
[size=3]Magicka: 50[/size]
[size=3]Stamina: 230[/size]
[size=3]-----------------------------[/size]
[color=#e06666][size=3][Better] Dremora Lord - Lvl 48[/size]
[size=3]Health: 567 (removed -200 preset, and level calculation added 22 points more)[/size]
[size=3]Magicka: 50[/size]
[size=3]Stamina: 238 (calculated from leveling from 46 to 48)[/size][/color]
[size=3]-----------------------------[/size]
[size=3]The following skill stats were calculated when leveling from 46 to 48.
[/size]
[size=3]One-handed: 100 (no change)[/size]
[size=3]Two-handed: 100 (no change)[/size]
[color=#e06666][size=3]Block: 92 (originally 84)[/size]
[size=3]Heavy Armor: 92 (originally 84)[/size]
[size=3]Sneak: 57 Â (originally 51)[/size][/color]
[size=3]-----------------------------[/size]
[size=3]All of the other stats aren't shown, because they are default 15.
[/size]
[youtube]xlSHvHBQQI4[/youtube]
[youtube]cYuCtOV3gzg[/youtube]
[color=#ffff00]
IF you decide to use the [/color][size=4]FULL ARMOR SET[/size][color=#ffff00][size=4] Dremora Lord, he will have the same stats, but more heavy armor points... so he will be able to resist more physical damage because of the helmet.

I suggest the [/size][/color][size=4]FULL ARMOR SET[/size][size=4][color=#ffff00] version, because it fits him more, as an Lord, and makes him tougher, also different than the other Dremora whom lack an helmet.[/color]

[color=#ffff00]ALSO, I have made an [/color]BUFF [color=#ffff00]version which makes his weight scale 100 (MAX), which also makes him look like a true BEAST, true Lord indeed.[/color][/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]Full dremora page can be viewed @ [/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=5]http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Dremora[/size][/color][/b]
author: mwjr
